exceptions.ConnException

    • Uses of ConnException in data

      Methods in data that throw ConnException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Student.setGenGroup(java.lang.String g)
      Set method for genGroup.
      void Person.setMail(java.lang.String m)
      Set method for private field mail, checked anti-hacking by static method Model.isHacker(String).
      void Person.setName(java.lang.String n)
      Set method for protected field name, checked anti-hacking by static method Model.isHacker(String).
      void Person.setPass(java.lang.String p)
      Set method for protected field pass, checked anti-hacking by static method Model.isHacker(String).

    • Uses of ConnException in mains

      Methods in mains that throw ConnException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Model.askForChange(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type)
      Inserts query with new value into Waiting SQL table, asking admin for check and update.
      void Model.changeGenGroup(Student student, java.lang.String genGroup)
      Changes general group of student in SQL database.
      void Model.changeMail(Person person, java.lang.String mail)
      Changes person's mail, using method Model.update(Person, String, String), after checking if new mail for sure is not in the database.
      void Model.changeName(Person person, java.lang.String name)
      Changes name of person.
      void Model.changePass(Person person, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Updates indicated person's password.
      void Model.changeStudentID(Student student, int student_id)
      Changes student's student id, using method Model.update(Person, String, String) and setting new student id to Student.
      (package private) Model.UserType Model.checkUser(java.lang.String mail, java.lang.String enteredPassword)
      Method checks if mail and password are in the database and initialises Model.userType parameter.
      void Model.createGroup(Group group)
      Creates new group with given data.
      int Model.getGroupIdByName(java.lang.String groupName)
      Gets group id, while given its name.
      private boolean Model.isWaitingInDatabase(java.lang.String type)
      Checks if this type, which we want to add to Waiting table for administrator check, is just waiting connected with this user, in table Waiting.
      void Model.logIn(java.lang.String mail, java.lang.String pass)
      Logs in the user, given mail and password.
      void Model.register(java.lang.String mail, java.lang.String pass)
      Tries to register new user, checking and taking his mail and password into Waiting table, waiting for admin check.
      private void Model.update(Person person, java.lang.String value, java.lang.String field)
      This private method updates given by parameters values in the tables - Students or Teachers.
